segments.text: Stephen , can you work overtime tonight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's wrong ? We have been working overtime recently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The holiday is coming so we need to finish our task .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Must we finish our task before the holiday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . The contract must be kept .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I know . But Bob wanted to change shifts with me tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He said he would celebrate his girlfriend's birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I will tell him about that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is convenient for me to work overtime tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for that . And I will double your pay .
segments.speaker: S1
